entity_action_chosen.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with minecraft:zombie_head{Unbreakable:1,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Grrr!","italic":false,"color":"white"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"You look a tad bit green.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:binding_curse",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:vanishing_curse",lvl:1}],HideFlags:5}

entity_action_respawned.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with minecraft:zombie_head{Unbreakable:1,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Grrr!","italic":false,"color":"white"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"You look a tad bit green.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:binding_curse",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:vanishing_curse",lvl:1}],HideFlags:5}

entity_action_removed.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with minecraft:air
